item.description:
Come enjoy the night air w/a harbor cruise around Newburyport featuring the Low Murphy Band.


The Low Murphy Band play's all the songs you love, but never hear live. Tickets are $25.00 and going fast, as of 7/9 there were only about 20 tickets left.

Your boat ride will be from 7:00-10:00pm, it leaves from Plum Island Point, and there is a cash bar aboard.

There are 3 Captain Lady's boats and they all leave from this dock, The Captain Lady's III is the largest one, please meet Robin at the start of the bridge/ramp to the boat. There are 3 boats, so the meet up beforehand to ensure we get on the right one.

To get your ticket for this event please call 978-821-1913, ask for Laura when you are ordering your ticket.


***Robin Bornstein will be the organizer of this event.
item.how_to_find_us: Robin will meet you at the end of the dock.
item.name: Come take a harbor cruise w/the Low Murphy band!
